root.name: Macross Digital Mission VF-X
root.description: In the year 2047 the Zentradi kidnap the popular singing group Milky Dolls in a plan to attack the Earth. The UN Space Agency (UN Spacy) sends the order to rescue the girls!Though 9 levels you use various Macross aircraft in missions ranging from typical dog fights to stealth based "follow the enemy to their base" missions,
